categories: Category:Cut content from The Epic Continues

nodes.text: The Skyriver Invader was a starship used by the genetic decoy of Zeta Magnus during his stint as Magister of Skye in 22 BBY. A strange, triangular craft, it reminded the Jedi Halagad Ventor of a T-11 model he used to play with as a youngling.

The Apex Invader was Atha Prime's personal starfighter. The craft was able to attach atop Prime's starship, Annihilator, which gave him the ultimate command vantage point for battles. It was used as his personal fighting vehicle and was piloted by his pilot droid Blue-Four.
